sources.title: The Fugitive (1933) REX BELL
sources.description:
1st Time on YouTube!
Starring Rex Bell, Cecilia Parker, Robert Kortman, George Hayes
Director: Harry L. Fraser

Half a million dollars has been stolen, but only prison inmate Dutch knows where it is. So Secret Service agent Joe "Lefty" Keyes goes deep undercover and is sent to prison. His intent is to bust Dutch out of the big house and find the stolen fortune.

metadata.Plot: A half a million dollars has been stolen and stashed away and prison inmate Dutch knows where it is. So Government Agent Joe goes to prison and makes friends with Dutch. When Joe breaks them out, Dutch leads them to the money only to find it gone. But Dutch's old gang is on hand and they haven't found it either.
metadata.Actors: Rex Bell, Cecilia Parker, Bob Kortman
